name: SalesOrderBasicV2_CreateShipmentActionBysaleOrderNumber
description: The action result dto contains information about the result of running the action

saleOrderNumber.description: Reference number of the sale oreder from which the shipment will be created

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

body.description: Defines the data for the action

$ul: **stateLocation**
**actionId**
**actionResult**
**errorInfo**
**referenceNumber**
**shipmentDto**: This class represents a Shipment in ShipmentController. Used by getting data.
**container**: Delivery settings tab > Intrastat section > Container > This check box indicates (if selected) that the shipment gets marked as shipped in container for Intrastat reporting purposes.

**controlQuantity**: The top part > Control quantity > The control value, which you manually enter as a value equal to the shipped quantity if the Validate shipment total on confirmation check box has been selected in the Sales orders preferences (SO101000) window.
**currencyId**: Delivery settings tab > Freight currency > By default, it is the currency of the sales order, but you can change it if needed.
**customer**: The top part > Customer > The customer to whom the goods specified in the document should be shipped. (This field does not appear for transfers.)
**internalId**
**name**: The name of the particular destination of the selected type.
**number**: The identifier of the particular destination of the selected type.
**deliveryAddress**: Delivery settings tab > Delivery address section >
**addressId**
**addressLine1**: Address 1 > The first line of the customer's/supplier's/company's/employee's contact address.
**addressLine2**: Address 2 > The second line of the address.
**addressLine3**: Address 3 > The third line of the address.
**city**: City > The city.
**country**: Country > The country.
**errorInfo**
**id**: Mandatory field: Country ID* > The unique two-letter country ID according to international standard ISO 3166.
**metadata**
**maxPageSize**
**totalCount**
**name**: Mandatory field: Country name* > The complete name of the country.
**county**: County > The county or province.
**id**: Click the magnifier > The identifier
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**overrideAddress**: Override address > A check box that you select to not include the default address information and to type new address information.
**postalCode**: Postcode > The postcode.
**deliveryContact**: Delivery settings tab > Delivery address contact section >

**attention**: Attention > The attention line as it is used in your customer's/supplier's/company's business letters. The intention of this line is to direct the letter to the right person if the letter is not addressed to any specific person.
**contactId**
**email**: Email > The email address of the customer/supplier/company as a business entity.
**fax**: Fax > The fax number.
**name**: Name > The legal name of to appear on the documents.
**overrideContact**: Override contact > A check box that you select to not use+ the default contact information and to type new contact information.
**phone1**: Phone 1 > The default phone number.
**phone2**: Phone 2 > An additional phone number.
**web**: Web > The website of the company, if one exists.
**errorInfo**
**fobPoint**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > FOB point > The point where obligation of goods passes to the customer.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**freightAmt**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Freight amt. > The amount of freight the customer will be charged for the shipment.
**freightCost**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Freight cost > The freight cost of the shipment.
**fromWarehouse**: Mandatory field: The top part > Warehouse ID* > The warehouse from which the goods should be shipped.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**hold**: The top part > Hold > This check box indicates (if selected) that the documents cannot be processed further until the check box is cleared.
**insurance**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Insurance > This check box indicates (if selected) that insurance is required for the shipment.
**lastModifiedDateTime**: System generated information.
**location**: Mandatory field: The top part > Location* > The customer location to receive the shipment.
**countryId**: Location*.
**id**: Click the magnifier > The identifier
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**metadata**
**maxPageSize**
**totalCount**
**modeOfTrasport**: Delivery settings tab > Intrastat section > Mode of transportation > The method of transportation.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**note**
**operation**: The top part > Operation > The operation to be performed in the Inventory workspace for this shipment: Issue or Receipt.
**owner**: The top part > Owner > The user assigned to approve the document.
**id**: Click the magnifier > The identifier
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**packages**: The top part > Packages > The number of boxes included in this shipment.
**packagesWeight**: The top part > Package weight > The total weight of the shipment that includes the weight of boxes (for boxes determined automatically).
**residentialDelivery**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Residential delivery > This check box indicates (if selected) that the shipping address is a residential one.
**saturdayDelivery**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Saturday delivery > This check box indicates delivery on saturday.
**shipVia**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Ship via > The carrier used for shipping the goods.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**shipmentDate**: Mandatory field: The top part > Shipment date* > The date when the document has been created.
**shipmentDetailLines**: Document details tab >
**shipmentNumber**: The top part > Shipment no > The unique reference number of the document, which is automatically generated by the system.
**shipmentOrderLines**: Orders tab >
**shipmentPackageLines**: Packages tab >
**shipmentType**: The top part > Type > The type of the shipment document, which can be one of the following options: Shipment, Transfer.
**shippedQuantity**: The top part > Shipped quantity > The quantity of goods shipped.
**shippedVolume**: The top part > Shipped volume > The total volume of the items in the shipment.
**shippedWeight**: The top part > Shipped weight > The weight of the goods shipped.
**shippingTerms**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Shipping terms > The shipping terms used in relations with the customer.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**shippingZone**: Delivery settings tab > Shipping information section > Shipping zone ID > The shipping zone of the customer.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**status**: The top part > Status > The status of the document.
**toWarehouse**: The top part > To warehouse > The warehouse to which the goods should be shipped in case of a transfer.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.

**transactionType**: Delivery settings tab > Intrastat section > Transaction type > The 1-digit code that describes the nature of the transaction (according to EU regulations for Intrastat reporting).
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**useCustomerAccount**
